scan.selectFolder: Select a scan folder on the left
scan.scanInstruction: Click "Scan Now" to scan the selected folder
scan.confirmStopDesc: Currently scanned {{count}} projects. These will be preserved, unscanned projects will be ignored.
scan.confirmRescanDesc: Rescanning will clear the current project list and rescan the {{name}} folder. This will overwrite previous project data.

project.deleteProjectConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete this project? This will move the project folder to trash.
project.deleteNodeModulesConfirm: Are you sure you want to delete node_modules? This will free up disk space.

emptyState.title: No projects yet
emptyState.description: Click "Add Scan Folder" button to select project folders to monitor.
